Le ultime Ricette

Grazie {{name}} per esserti registrato, ecco i tuoi dati:

  • Nome: {{name}}
  • Email: {{email}}
 import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Recipe } from 'src/app/models/recipe.model'; import { RecipeService } from 'src/app/services/recipe.service'; import { UserService } from 'src/app/services/user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent { evidenziato = false; ricette: Recipe[]; name: string; email: string; constructor( private recipeService: RecipeService, private userService: UserService ){}; ngOnInit(): void{ this.prendiRicette(); this.prendiDatiUtente(); } prendiDatiUtente(){ this.userService.datiUtente.subscribe((res: any) => { localStorage.setItem('name', res.name); localStorage.setItem('email', res.email); }); if(localStorage.getItem('name')){ this.name = localStorage.getItem('name'); this.email = localStorage.getItem('email'); } } closeModal(){ localStorage.removeItem('name'); localStorage.removeItem('email'); //oppure localStorage.clear(); this.name = ''; this.email = ''; } prendiRicette(){ this.recipeService.getRecipes().subscribe({ next: (response) => { this.ricette = response; this.ricette = this.ricette.sort((a,b) => b._id - a._id).slice(0,4); }, error: (error) => { console.log(error); } }); } onEvidenziazione(){ this.evidenziato = !this.evidenziato; } }
